description
Feel like Fei Long from Street Fighter IV with this alternate bodysuit top! For those who want to show off their perfect physique, this is for you! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Prenez-vous pour Fei Long de Street Fighter IV avec ce haut de costume alternatif ! N'hésitez pas à montrer la perfection de votre corps ! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

Fühle dich mit diesem alternativen oberen Teil eines Bodysuits wie Fei Long aus Street Fighter IV! Wer seinen Luxuskörper zeigen möchte, ist hier genau richtig! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

Diventa Fei Long di Street Fighter IV con la parte sopra di questo costume alternativo! Per coloro che desiderano fare sfoggio del loro fisico perfetto! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
¡Ponte este disfraz alternativo (p. superior) y siéntete como Fei Long de Street Fighter IV! ¡Para los que quieren mostrar un imponente físico! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
ストリートファイター4 フェイロンになりきることができる上半身のアレンジ ver.のボディスーツ 肉体美を表現するなら是非！ Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 페이롱이 되는 상반신 어렌지 ver. 보디 슈트. 육체미를 표현하고 싶으면 반드시! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Feel like Fei Long from Street Fighter IV with this alternate bodysuit top! For those who want to show off their perfect physique, this is for you! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
